Title: Sitting Bull, Dakota Chief, seated, holding a tomahawk on lap
Creator: Barry, D. F. (David Francis), 1854-1934
Summary: Seated studio portrait, 3/4 length, of Sitting Bull, Dakota Chief, holding tomahawk.
Description: 1 photonegative : glass, collodion ; 18 x 13 cm. (7 x 5 in.); 1 photoprint ; 15 x 10 cm. (6 x 4 in.)
Is Part Of: C Photo Collection 116. David F. Barry Collection.
